name: Water Spider Simulator
description:
You are a small spider in a pond. Build a spider web and fill it up with air to eat in. Hunt and bring the prey back to you web. Once you hunted enough you need a place to lay your eggs.

Made within about one week for the Oculus Start Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

  • Walk with thumbsticks
  • Trigger to shoot a net
  • Y/B to drop air bubbles
  • X/A to pull in while holding trigger
  • Throw yourself while holding and letting go of both grab triggers to jump up when walking
  • Hands for swimming
  • Swim against the surface to collect air

Credits:

  • Caustics texture taken from https://opengameart.org/content/water-caustics-effect-small
  • Under water ambient sound from https://freesound.org/people/wjoojoo/sounds/197751/
  • Shoot sound from https://freesound.org/people/Connersaw64/sounds/199823/
  • Impact sound from https://freesound.org/people/Matislav/sounds/521447/
  • Pop sound from https://freesound.org/people/greenvwbeetle/sounds/244657/

Made with my custom game engine Rayne (Open Source on Github).

The game sources are also available.
